description: The Junior Canadian Rangers program provides a week of activities and training to youth in Northern Ontario.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

**Junior Canadian Rangers Camp Loon 2023 Solicitation**

### Solicitation Summary

The Government of Canada, through the Department of National Defence, is soliciting offers for the Junior Canadian Rangers Camp Loon 2023 program. This program provides a week of training for youth aged 12-18 in remote and isolated communities throughout Northern Ontario.

### Solicitation Details

**Solicitation Number:** WS4038148066
**Closing Date:** June 6, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
**Contract Start Date:** July 17, 2023
**Contract End Date:** To be determined

### Description of Requirements

The Department of National Defence requires a contractor to provide facilities for the Junior Canadian Rangers Camp Loon 2023 program. The camp will be held from July 21 to August 4, 2023. The contractor must provide access to their facilities from July 17 to August 11, 2023, to allow DND to set up and tear down facilities and equipment.

### Eligibility

Only offerors who previously submitted a bid for solicitation number Doc3923015105 dated May 3, 2023, are eligible to bid on this requirement.

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection criteria will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation may be subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, and others.

### Address for Correspondence

Mughal, Nadeem (SPAC/PSPC)
nadeem.mughal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Other Relevant Information

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to offerors who participated in the previous solicitation.
